body.p: IFRS 16 requires a lessee to reassess variable lease payments that depend on an index or a rate when there is a change in the future lease payments resulting from a change in the reference index or rate. The IASB’s reasons are explained in paragraphs BC188–BC190. The FASB decided not to include any requirements to reassess variable lease payments.
